attributes.action: Outlaw the payment of any bonues, either large or small, to directors of banks and indeed any company that fails to make a profit or asks for Government help due their mismanagement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In these days of high numbers of people being made redundant, why should compay directors be paid large performance bonuses.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
